SAINT JOHN'S UNIVERSITY
COLLEGEVILLE, MINNESOTA *6321
DIRECTOR OF BROADCASTING
January 6, 1967
Mr. Jerald Sandler
Director of National Educational Radio
1346 Connecticut Avenue N.W.
Washington, D.C. 20036
Dear Jerry:
Enclosed are copies of our comments concerning the FCC's inquiry into
educational broadcasting.
Please keep us informed of any future developments concerning state
networks or federal aid to educational radio.
Sincerely,
William H, Klinfe Q
Director of Broadcasting
